content:
# We have successfully gathered 10 units of iron ore, bringing our inventory to 12 wood, 5 stone, 10 iron ore, and 1 iron plate.
# 
# Now we can return to the stone furnace and continue the smelting process to produce more iron plates.

# Let's move back to the furnace and insert the newly gathered iron ore into it.

move_to(furnace_position)  # Move back to the furnace.
insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, furnace, quantity=10)  # Insert the 10 units of iron ore into the furnace.
print(f"Inventory after inserting iron ore: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check inventory again. 

# Now we will also ensure there is enough coal in the furnace. We have 4 coal left, so we should add more to ensure continuous operation.
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, furnace, quantity=5)  # Insert 5 more units of coal for smelting.
